description.zh-cn: 中华民国高级将领，黄埔军校三期毕业，国民革命军第七十四军创设人之一。曾任74军军长、集团军及方面军总司令、山东省政府主席等职。在第二次国共内战中被俘，1959年特赦释放，1968年因文化大革命被批斗身亡。
description.en: A high-ranking general of the Republic of China, a graduate of the third class of the Whampoa Military Academy, and one of the founders of the 74th Corps of the National Revolutionary Army. He served as the commander of the 74th Corps, commander of an army group and a front army, and chairman of the Shandong Provincial Government. He was captured during the Second Chinese Civil War, pardoned in 1959, and died during the Cultural Revolution in 1968 after being subjected to struggle sessions.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国创建的军事院校，通称黄埔军校。
description.en: A military academy established by the Republic of China, commonly known as the Whampoa Military Academy.

nodes.id: 国民革命军第七十四军

zh-cn: 国民革命军第七十四军

description.zh-cn: 国民革命军的精锐部队之一，由王耀武等人创立，因战功卓著在抗日战争中被称为“抗日铁军”。
description.en: One of the elite units of the National Revolutionary Army, founded by Wang Yaowu and others. It was known as the 'Anti-Japanese Iron Army' for its outstanding military achievements during the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领，王耀武在国民革命军第七十四军的前任军长。
description.en: A military general of the Republic of China and Wang Yaowu's predecessor as the commander of the 74th Corps of the National Revolutionary Army.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领，王耀武在国民革命军第七十四军的继任军长。
description.en: A military general of the Republic of China and Wang Yaowu's successor as the commander of the 74th Corps of the National Revolutionary Army.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国在第二次国共内战时期于山东设立的军事绥靖区。
description.en: A military pacification zone established in Shandong by the Republic of China during the Second Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期山东省的最高行政长官职位。
description.en: The highest administrative post in Shandong Province during the Republic of China era.

nodes.id: 中国国民党中央执行委员会

zh-cn: 中国国民党中央执行委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党的中央执行机构。
description.en: The central executive body of the Kuomintang (Chinese Nationalist Party).

description.zh-cn: 指1945年至1949年间，中国国民党与中国共产党之间发生的第二次武装冲突。
description.en: Refers to the second armed conflict between the Kuomintang and the Communist Party of China from 1945 to 1949.

description.zh-cn: 1966年至1976年间由毛泽东发动和领导的政治运动。
description.en: A political movement launched and led by Mao Zedong from 1966 to 1976.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军高级将领，红十军团副军团长兼红19师师长。
description.en: A senior commander of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, deputy commander of the 10th Army Group and commander of the 19th Division.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民革命军在抗日战争后期的一个方面军级单位。
description.en: A front army-level unit of the Chinese National Revolutionary Army in the late stages of the Second Sino-Japanese War.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民革命军的一个集团军级单位。
description.en: An army group-level unit of the Chinese National Revolutionary Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民革命军的一个集团军级单位。
description.en: An army group-level unit of the Chinese National Revolutionary Army.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治家及军事家，曾任中华民国总统。
description.en: A Chinese politician and military leader who served as the President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国陆军一级上将，曾任中国战区陆军总司令。
description.en: A first-class general of the Republic of China Army, who served as the Commander-in-Chief of the Chinese Army in the China War Zone.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领，莱芜战役时任国军前敌总指挥。
description.en: A military general of the Republic of China who served as the front-line commander of the Nationalist forces during the Laiwu Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事将领，同时也是中国共产党的秘密情报人员。
description.en: A military general of the Republic of China who was also a secret intelligence agent for the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军华东野战军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军华东野战军

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军在第二次国共内战时期的主力部队之一。
description.en: One of the main forces of the People's Liberation Army during the Second Chinese Civil War.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要领导人。
description.en: The main leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会的简称。
description.en: Abbreviation for the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 北京82中教师，王耀武的第二任妻子。
description.en: A teacher at Beijing No. 82 Middle School and Wang Yaowu's second wife.

description.zh-cn: 王耀武的第一任妻子。
description.en: Wang Yaowu's first wife.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事人物，国民政府军事委员会调查统计局（军统）负责人。
description.en: A military figure of the Republic of China and head of the Bureau of Investigation and Statistics (Juntong) of the National Military Council.

description.zh-cn: 国民革命军第74军第58师师长。
description.en: Commander of the 58th Division of the 74th Corps of the National Revolutionary Army.

description.zh-cn: 国民革命军第74军第57师师长。
description.en: Commander of the 57th Division of the 74th Corps of the National Revolutionary Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要领导人之一，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: One of the main leaders of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who served as the Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的创始人和领导人之一，中华人民共和国十大元帅之一。
description.en: One of the founders and leaders of the Chinese People's Liberation Army, one of the Ten Marshals of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 国民革命军第七十四军

description.zh-cn: 王耀武是国民革命军第七十四军的创设人之一。
description.en: Wang Yaowu was one of the founders of the 74th Corps of the National Revolutionary Army.

relationships.target: 国民革命军第七十四军
中国国民党中央执行委员会

position.en: Member of the 4th National Committee of the CPPCC

description.zh-cn: 1937年淞沪会战时，王耀武所部隶属于俞济时指挥的第74军。1939年6月，王耀武接替俞济时任军长。
description.en: During the Battle of Shanghai in 1937, Wang Yaowu's troops were subordinate to the 74th Corps commanded by Yu Jishi. In June 1939, Wang Yaowu succeeded Yu Jishi as the corps commander.

description.zh-cn: 施中诚于1944年3月接替王耀武担任国民革命军第七十四军军长。
description.en: Shi Zhongcheng succeeded Wang Yaowu as the commander of the 74th Corps of the National Revolutionary Army in March 1944.

description.zh-cn: 在第二次国共内战期间，王耀武于济南战役中兵败被俘。
description.en: During the Second Chinese Civil War, Wang Yaowu was defeated and captured in the Jinan Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命开始后，王耀武因其历史问题时常被批斗，并于1968年病逝。
description.en: After the start of the Cultural Revolution, Wang Yaowu was frequently subjected to struggle sessions due to his past, and he passed away from illness in 1968.

description.zh-cn: 在谭家桥战斗中，王耀武率部以优势兵力围攻寻淮洲部，致使其伤重阵亡。
description.en: In the Battle of Tanjiabridge, Wang Yaowu led his troops with superior forces to besiege Xun Huaizhou's unit, causing his death from severe wounds.

description.zh-cn: 1944年冬，第24集团军扩编为第4方面军。
description.en: In the winter of 1944, the 24th Army Group was expanded into the 4th Front Army.

description.zh-cn: 1944年12月中国战区陆军总司令部成立，何应钦为总司令，王耀武时任的第四方面军为其下辖单位之一。
description.en: In December 1944, the Chinese Army General Headquarters was established with He Yingqin as the Commander-in-Chief. The 4th Front Army, commanded by Wang Yaowu at the time, was one of the units under its jurisdiction.

description.zh-cn: 蒋介石十分喜爱并信任王耀武，将其视为心腹爱将，并特许其自行决定团以上人事调度。
description.en: Chiang Kai-shek was very fond of and trusted Wang Yaowu, regarding him as a confidant and beloved general, and granted him special permission to independently decide on personnel arrangements at the regiment level and above.

description.zh-cn: 莱芜战役中国民党军队的惨败，使得王耀武在山东的军事形势转为被动和不利。
description.en: The disastrous defeat of the Nationalist forces in the Laiwu Campaign turned the military situation in Shandong into a passive and unfavorable one for Wang Yaowu.

description.zh-cn: 在莱芜战役期间，李仙洲作为前敌总指挥，在王耀武的指挥序列下。
description.en: During the Laiwu Campaign, Li Xianzhou, as the front-line commander, was under Wang Yaowu's command structure.

description.zh-cn: 莱芜战役中，李仙洲拒不执行王耀武的撤退命令，导致麾下部队被全歼，对王耀武的山东战局造成重大打击。
description.en: In the Laiwu Campaign, Li Xianzhou's refusal to follow Wang Yaowu's retreat order led to the annihilation of his troops, dealing a major blow to Wang Yaowu's military situation in Shandong.

description.zh-cn: 在莱芜战役期间，韩练成作为中共间谍，向李仙洲提供错误情报并进行蛊惑，导致李仙洲作出错误决策。
description.en: During the Laiwu Campaign, Han Liancheng, as a CCP spy, provided false intelligence to and misled Li Xianzhou, causing him to make erroneous decisions.

description.zh-cn: 在济南战役中，王耀武所率部队被击败，其本人被俘。
description.en: In the Jinan Campaign, the troops led by Wang Yaowu were defeated, and he himself was captured.

relationships.source: 中国人民解放军华东野战军

description.zh-cn: 在济南战役中击败并俘虏了王耀武。
description.en: Defeated and captured Wang Yaowu in the Jinan Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 王耀武被俘后，毛泽东通过罗瑞卿转告他，肯定其抗日功劳并鼓励其改造。
description.en: After Wang Yaowu was captured, Mao Zedong had Luo Ruiqing convey a message to him, affirming his contributions in the Anti-Japanese War and encouraging him to reform.

description.zh-cn: 郑宜芝是王耀武的原配妻子，两人育有五名子女，后离婚。
description.en: Zheng Yizhi was Wang Yaowu's first wife, with whom he had five children. They later divorced.

description.zh-cn: 据沈醉回忆录，王耀武得知妻子郑宜芝的感情背叛后，精神受到巨大打击，导致半身不遂。
description.en: According to Shen Zui's memoirs, after learning of his wife Zheng Yizhi's betrayal, Wang Yaowu suffered a severe mental blow that led to hemiplegia.

description.zh-cn: 王耀武在军界长袖善舞，对戴笠更是全力周旋，以维系良好关系。
description.en: Wang Yaowu was skilled at networking in military circles and made great efforts to maintain a good relationship with Dai Li.

description.zh-cn: 王耀武治军赏罚分明，因作战不力、操守不佳等原因处分了第58师师长廖龄奇。
description.en: Wang Yaowu maintained strict discipline with clear rewards and punishments, and he disciplined Liao Lingqi, the commander of the 58th Division, for poor performance in combat and misconduct.

description.zh-cn: 王耀武治军赏罚分明，因作战不力、操守不佳等原因处分了第57师师长余程万。
description.en: Wang Yaowu maintained strict discipline with clear rewards and punishments, and he disciplined Yu Chengwan, the commander of the 57th Division, for poor performance in combat and misconduct.

description.zh-cn: 经周恩来介绍，王耀武与吴伯伦结婚。
description.en: Through Zhou Enlai's introduction, Wang Yaowu married Wu Bolun.

description.zh-cn: 在得知王耀武被俘后家中并无余财，只有准备退役后回乡耕田用的两台拖拉机时，陈毅感叹唏嘘不已。
description.en: Upon learning that after Wang Yaowu's capture, his home had no surplus wealth except for two tractors intended for farming after retirement, Chen Yi sighed with emotion.
